studies.title: Studies
studies.name: Name
studies.empty: No studies have been created yet for your organisation.

studyactions.empty: No apps or plugins are linked to the study
studyactions.aggregator_apps: Add research app to be used with YOUR account
studyactions.description: After the study has been validated, you can link plugins and external data processing services to it. These plugins or services must connect to MIDATA using the credentials of one of the members of the research team with sufficient rights.
studyactions.shareback: Application shares data with participant group(s)

status.study_wrong_status: Not active due to study status
status.study_no_app_participation: Study does not allow to join using an app

types.OFFER_P: App or plugin offers study participation upon login/start
types.REQUIRE_P: Study participation is required to use the app or plugin
types.RECOMMEND_A: App or plugin is recommended by study
types.AUTOADD_A: Plugin is automatically added on study participation
types.DATALINK: App shares data to study participants

use_periods.RUNNING: During the execution of the study

studyfields.no_change_warning: This setup cannot be changed anymore after Study has been validated.
studyfields.pseudonymous2: , exported data reveals the pseudonymized identity, year of birth, gender and country. Some researchers like study nurses may have access to full personal data.
studyfields.anonymous2: , exported data reveals the spseudonymized identity, year of birth, gender and country. The pseudonymization mapping may not be accessed.
studyfields.not_anonymous2: , requests member to share full name, birthday and contact Information (address, phone, email)
studyfields.assistance2: - the MIDATA member needs assistance of a health professional.
studyfields.groups_empty: No groups of participants have been defined yet.

studyparticipants.name: Name
studyparticipants.only_first_shown: Only the first 1000 matching consents are shown.
studyparticipants.empty: This study does not have any participants matching your search criteria yet.
studyparticipants.acceptall: Accept all requests and assign new participants to participant group
studyparticipants.autojoin2: Accept all participation requests and assign new participants to the selected group as soon as the research application linked to this study connects.

studyrecords.empty: Once data is available it can be downloaded here.

studyrules.title: Study Rules
studyrules.no_change_warning: This setup cannot be changed anymore after Study has been validated.
studyrules.terms_of_use_hint: If the study General Terms and Conditions have to be read and accepted by the user, please send the text to MIDATA. We will upload the text in the correct format and provide you with the ID you need to enter here.

addresearcher.success: A new researcher has been added to your organization.

addparticipant.success: A new participant has been added to your study.

studyteam.defineself: You may change your own rights by readding yourself to the team with different rights. You may only do this as long as you are the only team member. You can't deprive yourself of the right to manage the team.

study_checklist.name: Study name and description defined
study_checklist.name_help: The study name will be shown to participants. The description will be available on the portal and during app login.
study_checklist.teamsetup_help: If more people are involved in carrying out the study, provide all involved persons and their role. As long as you have not added more people, you can change your own role by adding yourself again with another role.
study_checklist.groups_help: Your study may have one or multiple groups of participants. Please define the list of participant groups.
study_checklist.sharingQuery_help: Your study has to explicitely state which data of the participants it will access. The Data Access Filter cannot be changed after study has been validated.
study_checklist.dates_help: Start and end date will be shown to the participants. No data will flow into the study from the moment the data is frozen.
study_checklist.terms_help: If the study General Terms and Conditions have to be confirmed online by the participants, please contact MIDATA.
study_checklist.validation_help: Validation will be done by MIDATA after it has been requested. The study may no longer be changed after validation has been requested.
study_checklist.validation_passed_help: Please wait until study has been validated.
study_checklist.applications_help: You can link plugins and external data processing services to your study. These may read the participants' data and/or share aggregated data back to the participants. These plugins or services must connect to MIDATA using the credentials of one of the members of the research team with sufficient rights.
study_checklist.applinked: App has been linked with study
study_checklist.applinked_help: To link an application to your study, please send to MIDATA the code of your study and the name of the application you want to have linked.
study_checklist.partsearchstart_help: As long as participant search is not started it is not possible to participate to the study. Apps which require study participation may not be used.
study_checklist.executionstart_help: Marks this study as officially started.
study_checklist.acceptedpart: Participants assigned to groups and accepted
study_checklist.acceptedpart_help: New participants must be assigned to a participant group and be accepted or rejected.
study_checklist.partsearchend_help: No new participants may be recruited after participant search has ended.
study_checklist.execend_help: When the study is ended data are immediately frozen. The data stay available for download.
study_checklist.exportdata_help: Export the study data as FHIR JSON Bundle (separate for each participant group).
